data.title: hatchet
data.description: HATCHet (Holistic Allele-specific Tumor Copy-number Heterogeneity) is an algorithm that infers allele and clone-specific CNAs and WGDs jointly across multiple tumor samples from the same patient, and that leverages the relationships between clones in these samples.
data.name: hatchet

evidence: "HATCHet is an algorithm to infer allele and clone-specific copy-number aberrations (CNAs), clone proportions, and whole-genome duplications (WGD) for several tumor clones jointly..." (indicates a research analysis application).
Repository owner is "raphael-group", suggesting a specific research group or lab maintains the software.
README only links to documentation and shows CI badges; no mention of package managers, containers, or binaries, implying use via the source repository.

checks.reason: no binaries found in the repo
